healthcare_en: Healthcare provides medical services to individuals, including diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of illnesses and injuries. Their primary business sector is the provision of healthcare services, with a focus on delivering high-quality patient care through hospitals, clinics, and other medical facilities.
all the fintech companies that have rais: All the fintech companies that have raised funding in Bangalore are primarily involved in providing digital payment solutions, lending services, and financial inclusion platforms to cater to the growing demand for online transactions and financial services in India. These companies offer a range of services such as mobile wallets, peer-to-peer payments, credit scoring, and digital lending, among others.
